mention.text: a perilous software flaw allowing hackers to hijack internet explorer -LRB- ie -RRB- browsers and take over computers
software security firm trend micro say attacks based on the vulnerability in the world 's most popular web browser are '' spreading like wildfire '' with millions of computers

trend micro advanced threat researcher paul ferguson
botnets '' used to attack more machines and to send specious sales pitches to e-mail addresses in low-cost quests to bilk readers out of cash
